value.title: DataRobot’s new AI Cloud speeds up enterprise machine learning projects
value.excerpt: The startup says that the platform, AI Cloud, can function as the central hub for a company’s AI initiatives. It provides features for all the key coding and software deployment tasks involved in building machine learning applications.

value.title: Ambi Robotics, which develops robot grasping systems, raises $28M
value.excerpt: Ambi Robotics, a startup founded by UC Berkeley roboticist Ken Goldberg, has raised $26 million in venture capital.

value.title: Researchers lay the groundwork for an AI hive mind
value.excerpt: Intel's newest AI advances are a rising tide that lifts all vessels. But every science fiction horror story has to start somewhere, behold the hive mind.

value.title: AKA Announces Launch of New AI Social Robot “Musio S” and “Musio OS 4.0”
value.excerpt: AKA announced that it has scheduled the official launch of Musio S and Musio OS 4.0 for September this year. Musio S is AKA’s second-generation reference social robot with an increased focus on usability.

value.title: Robot vacuums are learning to avoid dog poop. But that’s not all they can see.
value.excerpt: Robot's new robot vacuum uses a front-facing camera and artificial intelligence to deftly maneuver your home. However these tools require more data.

value.title: Taking lessons from a sea slug, study points to better hardware for artificial intelligence
value.excerpt: For artificial intelligence to get any smarter, it needs first to be as intelligent as one of the simplest creatures in the animal kingdom: the sea slug.

value.title: Is The Robot War Upon Us?!

value.title: Roadblocks to Autonomous Security Robots
value.excerpt: There are concerns regarding the use of fully autonomous security robots which may get in the way of bringing them to market. Whether those concerns are legitimate or not may impact how quickly robotics will be adopted for security purposes.

value.title: Finally! A robot vacuum with AI that can sniff out (and avoid) dog poop
value.excerpt: They’re finally going there…so to speak. In what may be the biggest boon to animal lovers since pet food in a can, rolling robot vacuum maker iRobot has come up with an AI-assisted way for its newest model to tell the difference between pet poop and regular floor clutter.

value.title: Ethical Artificial Intelligence is Focus of New Robotics Program
value.excerpt: Ethics will be at the forefront of robotics education thanks to a new University of Texas at Austin program that will train tomorrow's technologists to understand the positive — and potentially negative — implications of their creations.
